title: Which is the greenest city on Earth? - Quora

response.answer_text: According to sources mentioned below greenest city on Earth is Copenhagen in Denmark where 50% of population rides on bicycle .The population of the city is 569557. Denmark is also trying to become first ever carbon-neutral country by 2025. Sources:-https://themysteriousworld.com/10-greenest-cities-across-the-world

Here is the Greenest city in the World. Here 5 most greenest city. Copenhagen, Denmark.  Amsterdam, Netherland.  Curitiba, Brazil.  London, England.  Stockholm, Sweeden.  Source:- google image (Stockholm Sweden).
